data: I remember the preacher saying, “I now pronounce you man and wife—,” and I remember the sweet smile on Lorraine Bowman’s face and the dazed smirk on Johnny Larkin’s, and the clank of sabers as we walked up the aisle through an arch of gleaming steel.
